Text: The High Sheriff is the oldest secular office under the Crown.
Triplets:<The High Sheriff
1:
--------------------
Text: High Sheriff of Lincolnshire:  Formerly the High Sheriff was the principal law enforcement officer in the county but over the centuries most of the responsibilities associated with the post have been transferred elsewhere or are now defunct, so that its functions are now largely ceremonial.

Triplets:<High Sheriff
2:
--------------------
<Text: High Sheriff of Lincolnshire:  The High Sheriff changes every March.>
